title: Two-Point Six
description: The National Climate Assessment is calling a two-degree increase in global temperature both catastrophic and inevitable. Enter your new YA dystopian obsession…  A 2.6 degree global increase in temperature wipes out all of the habitable regions of North America except the Northeast. To prevent any further damage, the new government issues an Give us control of the power supply and receive a place in the Greenhouse.  Nineteen-year old Rhea Zhang and her partner, Blake, are tasked with maintaining the new world order. As special agents, they’ve been groomed to protect the Grid Authority above anything else - but not everyone can be satisfied in a world without power. When a bioterrorist group starts targeting government’s operatives, Rhea and Blake find themselves at the center of a much darker plot.  There’s never been a worse time to be powerless.
author: Emma Xin
